text: Sitelen Sitelen (also known as Sitelen Suwi) is a project by Jonathan Gabel started in 2012, with which he created a non-linear form of writing inspired by the Mayan script for Toki Pona, a constructed language (or conlang) made by Sonja Lang. Sitelen Sitelen (drawing writing) is the third most used form of writing in Toki Pona: it creates sentences by putting together different drawings that indicate Toki Pona words. Each word in Toki Pona has a sitelen sitelen form. ==References== Category:Constructed languages
title: Sitelen sitelen
